description: The scope of this project is to replace the interior and exterior building lighting control system at 144 Wellington Street in Ottawa.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Building Lighting Control System Replacement

#### Important Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4609838146
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Publication Date**: May 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 24, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 25, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 22, 2024

#### Solicitation Details

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the replacement of the interior and exterior building lighting control system at 144 Wellington Street in Ottawa. The scope of the project involves the installation of a new control system that meets the requirements of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

#### Eligibility

* This invitation is reserved for holders of the Supply Arrangement (SA) EP938-232165.
* Interested suppliers who are not currently qualified for the SA may apply to become a qualified supplier by downloading the full solicitation documents from the Canada Buys website.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* Suppliers are expected to demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the RFP.

#### Contact Information

For more information or to submit a proposal, please contact:

Robert Angell (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not available
Fax: Not available
